Login.worksentence: Herafy – where the largest collection of handmade products meets passion and craft.

Signup.wemail: Please enter a valid email address
Signup.wpassword: Password must be at least 8 characters

FAQ.A1: To create an account, find the 'Sign up' or 'Create account' button, fill out the registration form with your personal information, and click 'Create account' or 'Sign up.' Verify your email address if needed, and then log in to start using the platform.
FAQ.A2: Our focus on providing robust and user-friendly content management capabilities ensures that you can manage your content with confidence, and achieve your content marketing goals with ease.
FAQ.q3: How can I reset my password?
FAQ.A3: If you’ve forgotten your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password.' Enter your registered email address, and we’ll send you a secure link to reset your password. Follow the instructions to create a new one.
FAQ.q4: What is the payment process on Herafy?
FAQ.A4: Payments on Herafy are simple and secure. Once you choose a service, you can proceed to checkout, select your preferred payment method, and complete the transaction. All payments are processed through trusted, encrypted payment gateways.

TermsOfSale.title: Terms of Sale and Packaging
TermsOfSale.guideline: Comprehensive guidelines for handmade product sellers on quality standards,
TermsOfSale.requiremnts: packaging requirements, and image specifications for Harfi platforms.
TermsOfSale.warning: All products are handmade, any non-handmade product will be removed.
TermsOfSale.imagequality: The seller is committed to providing high-quality product images.
TermsOfSale.productquality: Products must meet agreed quality and specifications with proper packaging to maintain quality during shipping.
TermsOfSale.policy: Each seller must display their own sales policies regarding order preparation and delivery.
TermsOfSale.productremarked: Products will be marketed on all Harfi platforms throughout the Arab Republic of Egypt.
TermsOfSale.offers: The seller offers a 10% marketing commission on the cost of the product sold to the craftsman.

Logo & Layout.five: Logo should not be large on product

Packaging.title: Packaging Products for Shipping
Packaging.des: All packaging types permitted with brand logo, but no direct contact information (phone numbers, social media pages).
Packaging.desc2: Fragile products must be packaged appropriately and labeled as "fragile" to prevent damage during shipping.
Packaging.notedes: The seller is fully responsible for providing proper packaging. Any damage due to negligent packaging is not covered by the platform. Seller losses from poor packaging are not compensated.
